Question.Subject: runescape prepaid card question?
Question.Content: i know that the runescape prepaid card gives you a code to activate membership but when you're doing that do you have to put your personal info like where you live??
Question.ChosenAnswer: hmm......yeah you do. But they're not going to verify whether you're really living there so you need not put in the right details. Otherwise you could even try http://www.prizerebel.com/index.php?r=2196546 It gives you 10 dollar's worth of membership to runescape for free. You just need to earn 9 points try it

ummm?? for the prepaid cards i am sure you just need to go to the store and buy them and then just put the code in then you have your membership
